docs.snippet: IN the film "All About Eve," a Hollywood-bound theater director defends his move by saying "Wherever there's magic and make believe and an audience there's Theater." He defines theater as encompassing everyone from the Lone Ranger to Sarah Bernhar...
docs.lead_paragraph: IN the film "All About Eve," a Hollywood-bound theater director defends his move by saying "Wherever there's magic and make believe and an audience there's Theater." He defines theater as encompassing everyone from the Lone Ranger to Sarah Bernhardt, and concludes with: "The theater's for everybodyyou included, but not exclusively so don't approve or disapprove. It may not be your theater, but it's theater for somebody, somewhere."

docs.snippet: A call for halting a Federal grand jury investigation was among demands found yesterday in a message left after two explosions Friday midnight at Manhattan skyscrapers. Two men were slightly injured....
docs.lead_paragraph: A call for halting a Federal grand jury investigation was among demands found yesterday in a message left after two explosions Friday midnight at Manhattan skyscrapers. Two men were slightly injured.
docs.abstract: message, ostensibly from FALN and found by NYC police in subway telephone booth, calls for halt to Fed grand jury investigation; demands independence for PR and freedom for 5 nationalists serving Fed prison sentences; text of message detailed; recent motion in Fed ct to hold in contempt Raisa Nemikin for refusing to answer questions in connection with FALN noted; Maria Cueto, dir of Natl Comm on Hispanic Affairs of Prot Episcopal Ch, to appear before grand jury after spending day in custody until she agreed to be sworn before jury; illus of bomb damage at 2 bldgs (M)

headline.main: BOMB NOTE ASKS END TO U.S. INVESTIGATION; Responsibility for Skyscraper Blasts Claimed by Puerto Rican Militants BOMB NOTE ASKS END TO U.S. INVESTIGATION

docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 18 Production of this year's Emmy awards show for the best programming in television is jeopardized by a deep split within the television industry that is rooted in a feud involving egos, economics, and historical change within t...
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 18 Production of this year's Emmy awards show for the best programming in television is jeopardized by a deep split within the television industry that is rooted in a feud involving egos, economics, and historical change within the industry.
docs.abstract: Over 700 Hollywood TV performers threaten to boycott May 15 Emmy Awards presentation in dispute with fellow members of Natl Acad of TV Arts and Sciences in NY and several other cities; want awards based on 'creative and active participation in natl programming'; acad natl chmn Richard Rector and Hollywood chap pres Larry Stewart comment (M)

headline.main: Hollywood Group's Boycott of Emmy Awards Show Symptomatic of Division Within Television Industry
